headline: US Treasuries Set for First Monthly Loss of 2025 on Deficit Woes
summary: (Bloomberg) -- US Treasuries are on track to deliver their first monthly loss this year, buffeted by renewed tariff uncertainty and growing anxiety over mounting levels of government debt. headline: Ex-Goldman exec gets 2-year sentence over 1MDB scandal
summary: Prosecutors sought leniency for Tim Leissner based on his cooperation, which the bank pushed back on, saying the former executive’s efforts are “deserving of sanction, not praise.”

raw.summary: Prosecutors sought leniency for Tim Leissner based on his cooperation, which the bank pushed back on, saying the former executive’s efforts are “deserving of sanction, not praise.”

headline: Tariff Ruling Threatens a $2 Trillion Fiscal Hole in Trump Plan
summary: (Bloomberg) -- The court ruling that blocked much of President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs threatens to blow what some economists estimate as a $2 trillion hole into the US fiscal outlook over the coming decade, should the judgment stay in place. headline: Two-year prison sentence for ex-Goldman banker Leissner in 1MDB case 'too short', Malaysia minister says
